summary:
Experienced within Procurement for projects Onshore & offshore - Oil & Gas, Refining and Chemical Industry. Knowledged on Industrial Steel Projects. Experienced projects with building Heavy Equipment for vessels, drilling and Pipelay Projects.
Work with principles like Total Quality Management and Performance Improvement to succeed quality performance within organisations and their teams.

Roles
Project Senior Expeditor, Consultant, Team Lead for Technical Documentation Deliveries (Improvement Program Project) at Huisman Equipment B.V.
Project Senior Expeditor at Danieli Corus
Procurement Project Expeditor at AJS
Project procurement Expeditor/Construction coordinator at Jacobs Engineering
Expediting & inspection Manager at Tebodin
Examination Coordinator at the Board of Urology
Accounts officer/Purchase Day Book
Sales & Marketing Management

Specialties: Procurement / Supply Chain
Total Quality Management (TQM)
Development of Procurement Strategies
Excellent attitude and approach within commercial & negotiation activities
Highly knowledged to coordinate activities in conjunction to Project Budgets and planning
Able to set up expediting and inspection activities within procurement and Supply chain  for workable procedures among disciplines between procurement and engineering, quality activities and site activities.

school.name: GCE 'O' level & 'A' level. London & Oxford University. Certifcation available

education.field_of_study: Chemistry, Physics & Biology, English., Italian, Maltese, History, Geography, Mathematics, Science

profile_positions.description:
As a Senior Expeditor & Consultant with PMC, I am detacheerd to PMC's Clients. 
Presently, my services are at MRCT as a Senior Expeditor / Consultant and introducing new methods for procedural improvements. My previous services were at Huisman Equipment BV's projects. These activities included desk and field expediting, Consultancy, achieving workable standard procedures and co-ordination. During my time with Huisman I was also reponsible to Team Lead and introduce a flowprocess regarding the Supplier's technical documentation deliveries (VDRS) system for excellent control for Technical Documentation  submission with a structual flow operation achieving, review, approval on time for quality assurance of the supplier's orders. This year assignment was to adapt and to achieve a tool specially tailored with a system, purposely made for the requirements of Huisman Organisation.
profile_positions.title: Senior Expeditor & Consultant

company.name: Primary school The Hague, The Netherlands

volunteer_experiences.description:
The school was lacking specialized English teachers and therefore my support was requested, to help out in giving the children of group 7 and 8,  the best education for English Language, in preparation of the secondary school. This helped the children to confidently achieve conversational level to high standards, in combination with excellent grammar capabilities.  
I attended once a week for a whole year during my normal work at that time.
The classes included: vocabulary, grammar, writing and conversational lessons for speech, which gave the children, variation of interest to keep them attentively concentrated and willing to learn.
To my surprise, at the end of my assignment, the students prepared a lovely song specially made for my departure. The song was prepared in English, which was well prepared by students themselves, and gave me a great satisfaction knowing they had achieved in learning a lot. Well done kids! I was really proud of you all!
